title: Ping volume is at zero
body: And is muted according to the button on the right. Why can I still hear pings? I've even closed my client and restarted it.

replies.body: That's cuz' I broke it - should be fixed in this patch - sorry folks. =/
Any chance of an option to mute a specific player's pings, instead of being forced to mute them all to avoid one annoying player?
I have the same problem. It sucks.

I previously had it set at 3. 
I don't mind pings, I just don't want them quite so loud (though I certainly appreciate being able to mute them, if this is an intended feature).
I'm more curious why you would mute pings to be quite honest.

> I'm more curious why you would mute pings to be quite honest.

I'd use it if someone was spamming pings, mostly. 
Another user suggested being able to mute a specific player's pings, which I also like. 

Honestly, when a user is spamming pings, they are no longer helpful to me; they're distracting.
